TITLE: Video platform Rumble to go public after successful SPAC vote
SUMMARY: Shareholders of Cantor Fitzgerald Acquisition Corp. VI, a special purpose acquisition company, voted Thursday to take Rumble public.

SUMMARY: Disney Chief Executive Bob Chapek said Thursday that the company's sports network ESPN is looking for a partner to help it step into sports gambling.

SUMMARY: Ford on Wednesday unveiled the redesigned 2024 Mustang hardtop and convertible with two gas-powered engines.

SUMMARY: Moving forward, Patagonia's profits that are not re-invested into the business will be donated to a group of nonprofit organizations fighting climate change.
